newsitem.title: USA: CBOT wheat lower in fast trade as soybeans slip.
newsitem.headline: CBOT wheat lower in fast trade as soybeans slip.

text.p: CBOT wheat futures turned mostly lower late in fast trading as soybean futures slipped from the day's highs, traders said.
"Everybody is selling wheat because beans are down 10 cents from the highs," a trader said.
Fast market signs were posted in nearly all contracts and there were no new fundamentals cited to precipitate the slide, the traders said.
At 1313 CST, wheat was 3-1/2 cents per bushel lower to four cents higher, with May down 3-1/2 at $3.94.
